text: Henry Earl Holliman (September 11, 1928 - November 25, 2024) was an American actor. Holliman was known for his roles in Forbidden Planet, Giant, Gunfight at the O.K. Corral, and in The Sons of Katie Elder. He won a Golden Globe Award in 1956. Yahoo! Movies - Earl Holliman Holliman died on November 25, 2024 under hospice care in Los Angeles, California at the age of 96. He was survived by his husband Craig Curtis. ==References== ==Other websites== * *Earl Holliman Fan website Category:Golden Globe Award winning actors Category:1928 births Category:2024 deaths Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:Actors from Louisiana Category:LGBT actors Category:LGBT people from Louisiana Category:Gay men Category:LGBT singers Category:Singers from Louisiana Category:American animal rights activists
title: Earl Holliman
